fullText: Something Rotten! is a musical comedy about two brothers in the 1590s who are trying to write the world's first musical. It's a show that knows exactly what it is: a big, goofy, self-aware piece of musical-theater fan service.
dtliExcerpt: Something Rotten! is a musical comedy about two brothers in the 1590s who are trying to write the world's first musical. It's a show that knows exactly what it is: a big, goofy, self-aware piece of musical-theater fan service.
bwwExcerpt: ...Something Rotten! has established itself as Broadway's funniest, splashiest, slap-happiest musical comedy in at least 400 years...tremendous care and showbiz savvy have gone into making a sophisticatedly silly rom-com that has it all: laugh-out-loud lyrics, catchy music, jaw-dropping sight gags and a powerhouse cast selling Bard-laced punch lines to the ecstatic balcony...the songs...are perfectly placed and deliver an escalating level of zaniness. Director-choreographer Casey Nicholaw...keep
